pr_title: Move unsupported files notification into problems console #173

timeline.author: asatklichov
Nurkambay

timeline.bodyText: Java 9 Map.of   can be used if we do not modify the map
timeline.author: asatklichov

timeline.bodyText: From Guice docs: Avoid using field injection with final fields, which has weak semantics.
timeline.author: temanbrcom
